headline: Strategic Deals Bolster VIAVI’s (VIAV) Growth Outlook, Backed by Analyst Confidence
summary: VIAVI Solutions Inc. (NASDAQ:VIAV) is one of the best low-priced technology stocks to buy right now. The company is taking steps to strengthen its position in the converging fields of network performance and cybersecurity. On September 10, the company announced a partnership with CrowdStrike, integrating VIAVI’s Observer platform with Falcon Next-Gen SIEM. The collaboration combines end-user […]
